comment: Deduce a group from its properties. Unlike ~ isgrpd2 , this one goes straight from the base properties rather than going through ` Mnd ` . ` N ` (negative) is normally dependent on ` x ` i.e. read it as ` N ( x ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
